mapper.select: SELECT id, content, rate, writer, perfumeId, TO_CHAR(createdAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdAtStr FROM REVIEW WHERE perfumeId = ${perfumeId} ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(perfumeId, content, rate, writer, createdAt) VALUES (#{reqDto.perfumeId}, #{reqDto.content}, #{reqDto.rate}, #{writer}, SYSDATE)
